scripts.build: vite build --config vite.config.prod.js && npm run check:sourcemaps
scripts.check:sourcemaps: bash -lc 'if find dist -name "*.map" | grep -q .; then echo Source map files found in production build; exit 1; fi'
scripts.check:secrets: bash -lc 'if rg -n --hidden --glob "!node_modules" --glob "!dist" --glob "!.git" --glob "!package-lock.json" "(api[_-]?key|secret|password|token)\s*=" .; then echo Potential hardcoded secrets found; exit 1; fi'
scripts.predeploy:security: npm run check:sourcemaps && npm run check:secrets
